contents.name: README
contents.contents:
My name is Clark DuVall. I am a Software Engineer at BetterWorks. This is my website.
You can find the source code to make your very own on GitHub.

If you need help, type "help".

You can contact me at clark.duvall@gmail.com or follow me on Twitter @theclarkatron.

contents.name: LokoApps
contents.description: I make apps using C++ (yes, C++!). Download Gravity Evolved for free - iOS, Android

contents.name: GitHub
contents.description: I have various projects hosted on my GitHub account (including this website).

contents.name: serpy
contents.description: A performant serialization library for Python used in production at BetterWorks.

contents.name: HyperLogLog
contents.description: A Go library for the Hyperloglog and Hyperloglog++ algorithms.

contents.name: YourNameInLife
contents.description: Animate your name using Conway's Game of Life.

contents.name: Pixelator
contents.description: Draw with your friends using WebSockets and HTML5 Canvas.

contents.name: GitterPatter
contents.description: Watch GitHub events rain down from the heavens.

contents.name: NackerHews
contents.description: Spoonerized version of Hacker News written using Go. Source on GitHub.

contents.name: SwissPosters
contents.description: I helped my brother make a Swiss style poster generator.

contents.name: JSOL
contents.description: (JavaScript Object Language) An experimental language I wrote.

contents.name: MoveJS
contents.description: Small JS library for creating particle systems with HTML canvas.
